> <OLD>
>
> Hydras supervised the seeker work and started to study the complex, hoping
> to find oud where they are and when

<NEW>

As HYDRAS began to scan the building and the surrounding area and
compare it with the history that he knew, there were several things
that were wrong.

The power plant that he was examining was called the Watts Bar Nuclear
Generating Station and it was located in what the humans would call
Rhea County, Tennessee, near Spring City, between the cities of
Chattanooga and Knoxville.

However according the history that HYDRAS knew, this city was still a
bustling metropolis. Humans were still manning it and it was fully
maintained. The city that HYDRAS was looking at was rusted and old, it
looked as if humans had left it several decades ago and the plant
itself had been long been shut down and closed off.

Something was wrong, very wrong. Things were different then they
should have been.

However from what he could tell, based on a quick dating method of the
metals and such, they were approximately in the present day for
Transformers and no longer in the past. But the questions was, were
they in their present . . or someone else's?

(TAG)

- Preston
